rows.label: qst400302_msg0002
rows.name:
Tora here to buy Perfect Range Sensor
and Bion Connectors!

rows.label: qst400302_msg0003
rows.name:
Ahhh, you're the young Nopon who was
gazing longingly at those the other day.

rows.label: qst400302_msg0005
rows.name:
Well, considering you were staring
for three hours straight...

rows.label: qst400302_msg0006
rows.name:
But I'm dreadfully sorry... We're all out
of Perfect Range Sensors right now.

rows.label: qst400302_msg0007
rows.name:
We've got plenty of Bion Connectors
still, though. They're 4,000G apiece.

rows.label: qst400302_msg0008
rows.name:
Twelve thousand for three of them,
huh... That really is pretty pricey.

rows.label: qst400302_msg0009
rows.name:
Boss promised to pay
whole amount. No backsies!

rows.label: qst400302_msg0010
rows.name:
I mean, sure, I'm not about to go
back on my word, but... Hmm...

rows.label: qst400302_msg0011
rows.name: Are you one of those salvagers?

rows.label: qst400302_msg0012
rows.name:
Yep. I may not look it, but I'm
actually a professional at it.

rows.label: qst400302_msg0013
rows.name:
Then maybe you could get a
Bion Connector that way.

rows.label: qst400302_msg0014
rows.name:
Apparently they fish the things up
quite regularly around this season.

rows.label: qst400302_msg0015
rows.name: Now that's not a bad idea.

rows.label: qst400302_msg0016
rows.name: Let's go give it a try!

rows.label: qst400302_msg0018
rows.name: I'll, um, cheer you on too!
